turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I forgot to set out my chicken to thaw tonight. Can you order me a pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, absolutely. Where from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's do domino's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, delivery or carry out?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ugh. Definitely carryout. Delivery can be so slow.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay! What kind of pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Meat lover's all the way.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay the Meatzza you mean?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep that's the one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size are you feeling?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large - I need some leftovers for lunch tomorrow.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It says they're temporarily out of the thin crust so would you like the regular hand tossed or to go full Brooklyn style?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's do it up right and go Brooklyn style.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And all the normal meat lovers toppings are good?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yes for sure. And add some green bell peppers on there too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. Do you want soda and brownies with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No no no. The pizza is unhealthy enough on its own.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Haha okay so a large Domino's meatzza pizza with brooklyn style crust and added green bell peppers. Right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, you got it. My card is on file.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay your pizza will be ready in 25 minutes! A confirmation was sent to your email.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks so much!
